title: boston celtics
content:
hi

first post... can anyone give me a few names of fonts like the Boston Celtics logo - not Princetown or Machine

Many thanks

Ian

| --- | --- |

author: pixelfinity

comments.content:
Submarine by Max Kisman:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/holland\_fonts/submarine\_bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140304210542/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/holland_fonts/submarine_bold/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/holland\_fonts/submarine\_bold/")

or Register by Rian Hughes  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=register&x=18&y=7](http://web.archive.org/web/20140304210542/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=register&x=18&y=7 "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=register&x=18&y=7")
